title: Ticket #970: STARTD_CRON documentation incomplete for streaming jobs
description:
http://www.cs.wisc.edu/condor/manual/v7.4/3_3Configuration.html#param:AllowVMCruft

The documentation for the STARTD_CRON functionality is unclear about how streaming jobs are used, which options require them, and doesn't even mention the need for a "-" record delimiter for them.
remarks: Ticket merged into existing ticket #609
creator: matt
